text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you're that same Trainer. 
I can say with confidence— 
that these lights have no signs of disappearing.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
They amount to… almost 20 now. 
Well, it's not like they're bothering me or anything.
Only a small number of people can see the small lights revolving around Stay Gold. It seems that nothing strange has come from them.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Hey, mind keeping me some company? There's a umamusme in my year that is knowledgeable about the occult.
So the place we ended up was—

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: What the!? Stego, is there some kind of spirit possessing you!?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Oooh. You can see them, Fukukitaru?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Nope, not at all! However, I shall attempt to do an exorcism from memory!

Fungyaro Fungyaro～ 
Go back… from whence…
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text: you came!!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Did it vanish!?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Nope, still here.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: … Huuuuh?

The instant exorcism had failed. 
Although there was no effect…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Huh? One of the lights has…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Vanished… 
Looks like you absorbed one of them…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ayaya? 
This… this scenery is…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, what I see and what I feel… 
This scenery… It feels… like I've…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Become a Happy Max Daigongen!! 
It feels like the greatest fortune in my life has come!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: … Hoh.
Seeing Matikanefukukitaru do a little dance, Stay Gold grinned and chuckled…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I think I get it. 
Although it's just a guess.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's get going, Trainer. 
We got a "Restoration" journey to go on.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
OOOOOOOOH! Dunno what's going on 
but I'm feeling pumped!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I don't understand it… 
I don't understand it, but I'm feeling frustrated

text_block_list.name: Seeking the Pearl
text_block_list.text:
…Hm? I don't feel anything special. 
Was there supposed to be something Fabulous?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Oh… Pearl didn't 
absorb one of the lights…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: If that's the case it has to be that. If there's certain Umamusumes that the lights return to, then there are others that don't.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
The lights have some type of homing instinct. 
You might not know what that is though.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Moving on, there's only 2 left now. 
An extra large pink one and an extra large green one.
Let's return the extra large pink one first.
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
Special Week
text_block_list.text: Stego… this is…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I knew the extra large pink one had to have been yours. 
Spe, how do you feel?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Well, um! I feel really happy! 
But～…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: This happiness… it's a bit much, I don't know how to phrase it. Um, for example～…
choice_data_list: Like you won a big race?
Like you ate a bunch of seafood?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes! Exactly like that feeling! When I won against strong umamusumes that I don't know!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Grass is there too… 
Ah, but she might not be there? I wonder which one it is…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Well, let's not sweat the small stuff. Anyways, the thing we came to return 
has been returned.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
It's good to savor that unique feeling. 
See ya.

Thank you. The amount of them 
decreased. A huge weight's been 
taken off my shoulder.
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Is that right? 
That's not the right feeling but…
Ah well, we can make it work! Certainly, it's like the happiness I feel when I eat a lot of delicious food!
text_block_list.name: Special Week
Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Well, only Spe can perceive what she's feeling.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
It's good to have your fill of it and savor it. 
See ya.

Thank you. The amount of them 
decreased. A huge weight's been 
taken off my shoulder.
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
"Render unto Caesar the things that are Caesar's" 
Finally, the last one—

This— extra large green one. 
If I can return it, I'd want to, but…
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
It might not go as smoothly this time. 
Let's take a break and advance carefully.
